backend/main.mo: Actor storing user profiles with access control, allowing users to save and query their own profiles and admins to view others' profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries of many frontend files, including components, hooks, config files, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme variables and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps TimerScreen with theme and email/password authentication providers.
frontend/src/components/EventSelector.ts: Dropdown component for selecting WCA events, disabled during active solves.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Email/password login and signup modal with validation, error handling, and mode switching.
frontend/src/components/ScramblePanel.ts: Displays the current scramble with a refresh button and loading state.
frontend/src/components/ScrambleVisualiz: Loads and renders 2D puzzle visualizations using TwistyPlayer from a CDN with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/SessionStats.tsx: Shows computed session statistics like best, ao5, ao12, mo3 in a responsive grid card.
frontend/src/components/SolveHistory.tsx: Scrollable grid showing recent solves with display times and DNF highlighting.
frontend/src/components/TimerDisplay.tsx: UI component that formats and displays timer, inspection, and final result states with color and text indicators.
frontend/src/components/TimerScreen.tsx: Main timer page managing events, scrambles, solves, session persistence, and authentication modal behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
Handles email/password auth via backend actor, managing session tokens, user state, and restoring sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, identity loading, and state management via context and AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that scrambling is done client‑side.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaScramble.ts: Generates and stores WCA scrambles using cubing.js with async loading and regeneration logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaTimerControls.t: Manages timer state, inspection countdown with warnings, and computing final solve results.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables including light/dark mode and timer-specific OKLCH color tokens, plus custom utility classes for timer colors.
frontend/src/lib/inspectionAudio.ts: Implements a Web Audio API helper that initializes an audio context and plays short beeps for 8‑second and 5‑second inspection warnings.
frontend/src/lib/sessionCookie.ts: Provides functions to save and load session data in a cookie, storing event, scramble, and solve history.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStats.ts: Computes current, best, and rolling averages (ao5, ao12, mo3) from a list of solves, handling DNFs and plus‑twos.
frontend/src/lib/wcaEvents.ts: Exports WCA event metadata with IDs, names, and scramble event codes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, loading global styles.
frontend/src/types/cubing.d.ts: Provides TypeScript declarations for external cubing scramble and twisty player modules.
frontend/src/types/solves.ts: Defines solve types and utilities to compute display and numeric times including plus‑two and DNF handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and exposing theme values based on CSS variables including timer colors.
project_state.json: Describes project context and requirements for replacing Internet Identity with a custom email/password authentication system using a Motoko backend.
